sentences.en: ‘He's gone! ’ Viv echoed.
sentences.cn: “他去了！”维夫重复道。

sentences.en: ‘You bet,’ she said, echoing his words.
sentences.cn: “当然啦。她重复着他的话。

sentences.en: He could hear eerie noises echoing through the corridors.
sentences.cn: 他听见恐怖的声响在走廊里回荡。

sentences.en: He is an echo of his master.
sentences.cn: 他是主人的应声虫.

sentences.en: Her scream was followed by a loud echo.
sentences.cn: 她的尖叫声过后是响亮的回声。

sentences.en: I hear an echo of the thinking that got us into this mess in the first place.
sentences.cn: 我听到有人重提那个最先使我们陷入这一困境的想法。

sentences.en: I should like to echo the words of the previous speaker.
sentences.cn: 我想重复前面一位发言者的话.

sentences.en: It was almost literally an echo , in fact.
sentences.cn: 差不多就是真正的“回声”.

sentences.en: Many phrases in the last two chapters echo earlier passages.
sentences.cn: 最后两章中的很多说法是对前面段落的呼应。

sentences.en: Pinks and beiges were chosen to echo the colours of the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 选用了粉红色和米色，以跟从天花板的颜色。

sentences.en: Political attacks work only if they find an echo with voters.
sentences.cn: 政治攻击只有在选民中引起共鸣才会有作用。

sentences.en: She shouted on the mountaintop and listened for the echo.
sentences.cn: 她在山顶上大声喊着,然后聆听着回声.

sentences.en: The bat judges distances by a kind of echo - location.
sentences.cn: 蝙蝠用一种回声测定法来判断距离.

sentences.en: The echo resounded back to us.
sentences.cn: 回声传回到我们的耳中.

sentences.en: The old fable continues to echo down the centuries.
sentences.cn: 这则古老的寓言流传了数个世纪。

sentences.en: The sound of an engine echoed back from the thick forest.
sentences.cn: 从茂密的森林里传来引擎的回声。

sentences.en: The valleys echo the sounds of the mountains.
sentences.cn: 山鸣谷应.

sentences.en: Their views often echo each other.
sentences.cn: 他们常常你唱我和。

sentences.en: There was an echo on the line and I couldn't hear clearly.
sentences.cn: 电话里有回音，我听不清楚。

sentences.en: Why do you always have to echo back my opinions like this?
sentences.cn: 你为什么总是这样非附和我的意见不可 呢 ?

phrases.phrase: applaud (或 cheer) someone to the echo
phrases.tran_cn: 为某人大声叫好，为某人喝彩
缺陷回波；缺陷的回波信号；缺陷回声

trans.tran_en: a sound that you hear again after a loud noise, because it was made near something such as a wall
if a sound echoes, you hear it again because it was made near something such as a wall or hill

trans.tran_cn: 回响，发出回声，重复，附和，模仿，持续影响
trans.tran_en: to repeat what someone else has just said

trans.tran_cn: 产生回声， 产生回响
trans.tran_en: if a sound echoes, you hear it again because it was made near something such as a wall or hill
